original_text: And the one who spoke with me had a measuring rod of gold to measure the city and its gates and walls.
korean_text: 내게 말하는 자가 그 성과 그 문들과 성곽을 측량하려고 금 갈대 자를 가졌더라

sentences.original_text: And the one who spoke with me
had a measuring rod of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 금으로 만든 측량 막대기를 가지고 있었고
